custom-meta.meta-value: "Colorado Springs" is available (printed) in Ref. 19. "Iceland" is available (printed) in Ref. 20. "HIV" is available (printed) in Ref. 18. "Prostitution" is available as an online attachment to: Luis E. C. Rocha, Fredrik Liljeros and Petter Holme, Simulated epidemics in an empirical spatiotemporal network of 50,185 sexual contacts, PLoS Comp. Biol. 7, e1001109 (2011). All other data sets are available at http://www.sociopatterns.org/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/detailed_list_of_contacts_Hospital.dat_.gz (hospital), http://www.sociopatterns.org/wp-content/uploads/2015/09/primaryschool.csv.gz (school 1 & 2), http://www.sociopatterns.org/files/datasets/003/ht09_contact_list.dat.gz (conference).
